forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
